trdesc: Regulates blood sugar levels using insulin.

disease.disdesc: A chronic condition that affects the way the body processes blood sugar.

trdesc: Relieves asthma symptoms by relaxing airway muscles.

disease.dissymp: Shortness of breath, wheezing, chest tightness
disease.disdesc: A condition in which a person's airways become inflamed, narrow and swell, producing extra mucus.

trdesc: Improves joint mobility and reduces stiffness.

disease.disdesc: Inflammation of one or more joints, causing pain and stiffness that can worsen with age.
